_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

How to understand the detailed meaning o: Personally respect the Teacher and praise such respect
Encourage other mendicants who lack such respect to respect the Teacher
Praise other mendicants who respect the Teacher at the right time, truthfully and substantively
Personally have good friends, and praise such friendship
Encourage other mendicants who lack good friends to develop good friendship
Praise other mendicants who have good friends at the right time, truthfully and substantively.
